###Initialize libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)        ## install.packages("skimr")
library(readr)
#
# ALT plus hypen = <- (within chunk)
# ctrl plus shift plus m = %>% 
# ctrl + ALT + I = insert chunk
# ALT + - = insert assignment operator
# filter rows, select columns
# RMD comment = <!-- comment -->
# 

```


###Input Data
```{r, input data}

tidy_heights <- read_csv("tidy_seedling_heights_2017-2019.csv") %>% 
  select(!c(date)) %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(harvest, year, point, location, spp, origin),
            list(factor)
  )


```


###Group Means
```{r, group means}

height_summ <- tidy_heights %>% 
  group_by(harvest, location,year, spp, origin) %>% 
  summarise(
    ht_avg = mean(height),
    n = n()
  ) %>% 
  filter(n>5) %>% 
  filter(!c(year =="2017"))

view(height_summ)
```
